sub_title: Strategy Execution & Executive (Team) coaching  | ֍ Unlocking &  Managing Human Capacity :  Accelerated Impact ֍ | Speaker & Author
summary:
What I see within organizations is the constant addition of new initiatives, tools, concepts and structure changes. Stacking behavior with the unintended consequences that teams get overloaded, things that are started are not completed, involvement decreases (people drop out or leave) and unnecessary complexity arises.  
As a result, the potential of the human capacity in organizations is far from being utilized.

Too little and too slowly is stopped and simplified within organizations.  

And this is easier and faster to break through than many think.  That's what I help teams and leaders with. The release of human capacity and the greater use and growth of existing potential.


NEW BOOK "OFFLOAD" to be published in Dutch (fall 2023) and English (January 2024)

Organizations add stuff non-stop such as; projects, products, tools, it-solutions, information, chats. But far too little and too slowly they remove and/or simplify stuff. With some significant consequences.

1) Delay on progress towards strategic goals
2) Teams and team members become overcommitted resulting in attrition (burn out) or departure
3) Involvement decreases rapidly, it becomes less and less clear what is really important and contributes to the existence of the organization


This book, based on working with dozens of management teams and hundreds of managers, shows how to unload and thereby accelerate the progress of important initiatives, make team workloads manageable again and increase engagement. 

MAKE PROGRESS in MEANINGFUL WORK ! 

Supporting organizations with Strategy Execution challenges. It’s a challenge to properly run and improve current business while at the same time taking fundamental steps and making PROGRESS in MEANINGFUL WORK. 

With a high impact approach (Unlocking Human Resources / Simplifying / Faster Decision making), the strategy becomes significantly more actionable and progress accelerates. 

Currently (2023) working for International customers in Biopharmaceutical Industry (Merck/MSD, Organon, Alnylam) , Education (Amsterdam Institute of Finance, Sijthoff Media Group), Energy (Stedin), Finance (ABN AMRO Bank), IT (Simac) (, Mobility (Leaseplan) and Retail (Specsavers, Home Fashiongroup).  

Background: 
Strategic senior executive with over 20 years of experience as the driving force behind strategy & strategy execution. Entrepreneurial background with 2 MBO experiences (CVC as Private Equity provider). Resourceful and original in solving new and existing challenges.  Does understand Business challenges and opportunities fast.
